id: admin-list-workspaces

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List workspaces"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/admin/workspaces"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a list of all workspaces in your Seqera Platform account. Append `?search=<workspacename>` to return results for a given `<workspacename>`.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"max","in":"query","description":"Pagination max results","schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},{"name":"offset","in":"query","description":"Pagination offset","schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},{"name":"search","in":"query","description":"Filter search parameter","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"totalSize":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"workspaces":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"visibility":{"type":"string","enum":["PRIVATE","SHARED"],"title":"Visibility"},"orgId":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"workspaceId":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"role":{"type":"string","enum":["user","root","owner","member","collaborator","admin","maintain","launch","connect","view"],"title":"SecurityContextRole"},"orgName":{"type":"string"},"workspaceName":{"type":"string"},"workspaceFullName":{"type":"string"}},"title":"OrgAndWorkspaceDbDto"}}},"title":"ListWorkspacesWithOrgInfoResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
